{{Infobox Pokéball |name = Hyper Ball |image = [[File:Ultraball.png]] |caption = Image en jeu de la ''Hyper Ball''. |price =
*2 000 {{pdollar}} *1 {{Battlepoints}} |catchTime = 0,75s |catchRate = 10% |location =
*[[Ultraball/fr#Shops|Boutiques]] *[[Ultraball/fr#Dungeons|Donjons]] *[[Shops/fr#Poké Mart|Centre Commercial]] *[[Shops/fr#Battle Frontier|Zone de Combat]] }} ==Description== L''''Hyper Ball''' est un type de [[Pokéballs/fr|Ball]]. Elle est automatiquement lancée pour capturer un Pokémon sauvage après l'avoir mis KO s'il s'agit du plus haut type de Ball actif et qu'il vous en reste dans la fenètre de sélection de Poké Ball. ==Détails== Une excellente Ball pour capturer les Pokémon, avec un bonus de 10% à la capture, elle attrape le Pokémon en 0,75 seconde. == Acquisition == ===Boutiques=== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Pokéballs}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Kanto: Locations & Items|Parmanie]]|2 000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Johto: Locations & Items|Irisia]]|2 000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Hoenn: Locations & Items|Cimetronelle]]|2 000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Hoenn: Locations & Items|Nénucrique]]|2 000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Sinnoh: Locations & Items|Parsemille]]|2 000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Unova: Locations & Items|Mistralton City]]|2 000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Kalos: Locations & Items|Port Tempères]]|2 000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Alola: Locations & Items|Cap Passiloin]]|2 000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Poké Mart|Centre Commercial]]|2 000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops/fr#Battle Frontier|Zone de Combat]]|1 {{Battlepoints}}}} |} |} ===Donjons=== {{Loot/head‎|Pokéballs}} {{LootItem|Pokemon Tower|Mythique}} {{LootItem|Silph Co|Mythique}} {{LootItem|Seafoam Islands|Mythique}} {{LootItem|Pokemon Mansion|Légendaire}} {{LootItem|Mt. revision.text:
{{Infobox Pokéball |name = Hyper Ball |image = [[File:Ultraball.png]] |caption = Image en jeu de la ''Hyper Ball''. |price =
*2 000 {{pdollar}} *1 {{Battlepoints}} |catchTime = 0,75s |catchRate = 10% |location =
*[[Ultraball/fr#Shops|Boutiques]] *[[Ultraball/fr#Dungeons|Donjons]] *[[Shops/fr#Poké Mart|Centre Commercial]] *[[Shops/fr#Battle Frontier|Zone de Combat]] }}
==Description== The '''Ultraball''' is a type of [[Pokéballs|Pokéball]]. It automatically tries to catch a wild Pokémon after defeating it if is the highest type of Pokéball active and there is a remaining supply in the Pokéball selector.
==Details== An excellent Pokéball to capture Pokémon with, it provides a +10% catch rate bonus and catches Pokémon in 0.75 seconds.
== Acquisition == ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Pokéballs}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kanto: Locations & Items|Fuschia City]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Johto: Locations & Items|Cianwood City]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Hoenn: Locations & Items|Fortree City]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Hoenn: Locations & Items|Lilycove City]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Sinnoh: Locations & Items|Pastoria City]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Unova: Locations & Items|Mistralton City]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Kalos: Locations & Items|Coumarine City]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Alola: Locations & Items|Malie City]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Poké Mart|Poké Mart]]|2,000 {{pdollar}}}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Battle Frontier|Battle Frontier]]|1 {{Battlepoints}}}} |} |}
